annotations: Business consultant with over 5 years of experience in strategic advisory, digital transformation, and business development. Specialized in process optimization and supporting tech companies in achieving sustainable growth. Strong academic background in strategic management and digital marketing.
2022 – 2023 | Business Consultant | ArrowAI, San Francisco, CA
- Advised AI startups on fundraising strategy and product positioning.
- Achieved a 30% revenue increase for three key clients through targeted operational recommendations.
- Implemented performance dashboards and KPI tracking tools.
2021 – 2022 | Business Consultant | ArrowAI, San Francisco, CA
- Conducted comprehensive market analysis for the launch of a B2B SaaS product.
- Designed investor presentations and participated in pitches resulting in $1.2M in funding.
2020 – 2021 | Business Consultant | ArrowAI, San Francisco, CA
- Led the restructuring of the sales team including reorganization, training, and goal setting, resulting in a 25% boost in productivity.
- Performed internal audits to identify and address operational inefficiencies.
2016 – 2019 | Master of Business Management | University of Southern California (USC)
2012 – 2016 | Bachelor of Business Management | University of Southern California (USC)
Strategic: Business Development, Market Analysis, Business Planning
Marketing: Digital Marketing, SEO/SEA, Product Positioning
Soft Skills: Negotiation, Leadership, Communication, Problem-Solving
